::Inu-Yasha::
Inu Projects a Image of Lilly in Fornt of Koj.

::Koj::

Stops his fury attack and tries to change his target to avoid hitting the 
illusion of Lilly.
                         ::The Universe Inside Koj::
::Soundwave::
A giant figure looms Koj "Your battle was lost before it started Koj"


::Koj::
"Soundwave"

::Soundwave::
Grabs Koj starts to crushing him slowly."You have give up everything you 
cared for your Lilly, your Master Fe-Ling and your World and for what if you 
looking for forgiveness you will not find it here you have found  nothing!"

::Koj::
Koj anger grows as he feels his core focus being destroyed "Now way"

::SoundWave::
"Your Lilly, and Fe-ling Are wasting away because the hope they had for you 
has died all that is left is there anger for you it serges."

::Koj::
"No it can't be I was thinking of them I swear it I was."

::Soundwave::
"Then you made a grave error"

::Koj::
Koj sees pictures of Lilly before she died hears her calling "promise me to 
be a hero."
